name: Luna's Adventure: The Overlord
description:
"When I am not with her, I feel alone. When I am with her, I feel even more lonely"

Every hundred years, a demon known as the Overlord appears in the world and claims a new wife in exchange for not destroying the world, so the persons offers him a girl to marry him and thus leave in peace for another hundred years.
On this occasion, the victim has been a girl named Meya. But, unable to bear the thought of losing her best friend, Lunafreya, a fifteen-year-old girl, decides to break this terrible tradition and do everything in her power to rescue her.

• Third-person adventure and fantasy RPG with real-time combat.

• A whole interconnected world to explore with different biomes. Forests, deserts, glaciers...

• Sail across the sea. Explore islands, board pirate ships and find secret treasures.

• Side quests that matter: tell the plot, take you through new stories, and allow you to discover new places.

• Full of bosses. Can you find and defeat them all?

• Multitude of weapons and types of enemies. Equip yourself with your favorite class, learn new skills by leveling up, and take on powerful monsters.

• Variety of hats and clothing dyes to customize Lunafreya and a magical gem system to unleash new powers.
